entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS CollectionView thows exception when adding items to an ObservableCollection #3514
  • In WinUI, parent measure override not called while children collection change in dynamic time #3512
  • Navigation back causing app to crash #3511
  • In iOS, grid children's positions is not working in load time #3510
  • In preview 10 absolute layout draw override method not called #3509
  • Maui-WinUI : Unable to re use the path for gap filled arc shape drawing #3507
  • BackgroundColor Animation not working on certain controls on Windows #3506
  • RandomNumberGenerator.GetInt32 throws DllNotFoundException on iOS #3505
  • Picker doesn't visually update its selected value on iOS #3504
  • System.TypeLoadException: VTable setup of type BindableObject failed #3501
  • System.MissingMethodException #3500
  • SupportedOSPlatformVersion 10.0.22000.0 cannot be higher than TargetPlatformVersion 10.0.19041.0 #3499

Closed

  • The minimum value in the slider is not being updated. #3498
  • Image not displaying background color on Windows #3478

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround #3514 #3516
  • Set the correct current page when popping #3515
  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513

Merged

  • [Windows] Button border properties #3409
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • iOS 13+ always uses the scenes if there is one registered in the manifest #3454
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Update Entry and Editor to use Windows 11 styles #3444
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Add demands for macOS #3508
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Slider issues using Minimum and Maximum values #3503
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix issue setting the Image Background #3502
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:

Updated

  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Modifed XAML Source Generator to emit MemberNotNull attributes for named XAML controls #3497
    area/Xaml </>
  • Several fixes and changes to the dispatchers #3453
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • Add extension to add an IView to a GridLayout at specific column/row #3484
    area/layout 🔲
  • Minimal changes required to support remotewebview #3496
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Move most of the types in the Platform folder to the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
